summary.p: The volume 2 of a 2-volume Villipāratam (BnF Indien 263-264).
Description based on the digital images available on Gallica.

supportDesc.foliation: Left-marginal Tamil numerals foliation and parallel left-marginal Arabic foliation (U3).

collation.desc: the front cover. BnF shelfmark sticker on back cover, verso.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
1 folio = Pāratam = Villipāratam: Title Page. No foliation. Verso blank.
248 folios = Pāratam = Villipāratam: Text. Tamil foliation 1-248 and parallel Arabic foliation 1-248.
2 folios = back guard leaves. Blank recto verso.

additions.desc: On a detached paper sheet. The number is that found in the catalogue of Velanguani Arokium (1845).
BnF current shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 264 (front cover, recto).

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to circa 1828 by Vinson (in Vinson et al. 1866-) and to 1828 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably Ducler's provenance). By Ducler's scribe, working around 1830. Probably not before 1828 (date of the earliest internally dated Ducler's manuscript). Not later than its first mention (Burnouf 1832).

provenance.p: Copied for Philippe Ducler by an unnamed copyist in Karaikal Jail. See Burnouf (1832).

acquisition.p: Acquired, July 22nd, 1833, from Philippe Ducler. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1833-1848, no. TBC.

listBibl.bibl: Burnouf, Eugène. 1832. Rapport fait au Conseil, dans la séance du 2 juillet 1832, sur les collections de manuscrits et de dessins rapportées de l’Inde par M. Ducler, administrateur de Carical, membre de la Société asiatique. Journal asiatique 10: 84-91. — See p. 88, n0. 16.
Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 40, n0. 264.
Velanguani Arokium [Vēḷāṅkaṇṇi Ārōkkiyam]. 1845. Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls de la Bibliothèque royale. BnF NAF 5443. — See p. 15, no. 23.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 62r, no. 244 264.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
